TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit AttachedPropertyBrowsableForChildrenAttribute extends System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableAttribute

summary.span: 指定附加屬性具有延伸至邏輯樹狀結構中子項目的可瀏覽範圍。

span.span: Specifies that an attached property has a browsable scope that extends to child elements in the logical tree.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一詞的意義`browsable`會用在此描述[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]類似於提供的描述，附加屬性的可瀏覽狀態是特別針對屬性資訊，但[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]，附加的屬性主要是因為[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]概念。The meaning of the term `browsable` as used in descriptions for this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] is analogous to the descriptions given for , but the browsable state for an attached property is particularly relevant to property information for [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)], because an attached property is primarily a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] concept. 當這[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]套用至 get 存取子，針對附加的屬性，這[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]指定附加的屬性的擁有者是其他元素的父項目時，為可瀏覽附加的屬性。When this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] is applied to the get accessor for an attached property, this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] specifies that an attached property is browsable when the attached property owner is a parent element of other elements. 解譯時設計工具，會使用類型描述元資訊，設計工具應該加入此屬性為可瀏覽屬性之邏輯樹狀結構中的所有子項目，根據父項目與此[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]套用。When interpreted by a designer that uses type descriptor information, the designer should add this property as a browsable property to all child elements in the logical tree, based on the parent element with this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] applied. 一般而言，可瀏覽狀態與功能。Generally, the browsable state parallels functionality. 例如，指定子項目的項目上的可瀏覽，因為包含的任何設定的值時檢查程式碼子項目。For example, is designated browsable on elements that are child elements of a , because includes code for checking any set values of on child elements. 這[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]父項目位置支援兩種類型的樹狀目錄中偵測模式： 淺層模式和深層模式。This [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] supports two types of tree detection modes for parent element positions: a shallow mode, and a deep mode. 淺層的模式，這是套用的預設模式 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]，需要直屬父項目是為了讓連接屬性設為可瀏覽屬性的擁有者類型。The shallow mode, which is the default mode for an applied [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)], requires that the immediate parent element be the owner type of the property in order for the attached property to be browsable. 深層模式由套用具有宣告為`true`。The deep mode is declared by applying the attribute with as `true`. 深層模式是較不嚴格，因為它只要求擁有者型別是某個位置中的上階方向邏輯樹狀結構，並因此附加的屬性是可瀏覽上所有的子元素，僅限於直接子項目。The deep mode is less restrictive because it only requires that the owner type be somewhere in the ancestor direction of the logical tree., and therefore the attached property is browsable on all child elements, not just immediate child elements. 附加的屬性使用方式，其中中間項目邏輯樹狀結構中不應該報告為 true 的父元素套用深層模式。The deep mode is applied for attached property usages where intervening elements in the logical tree should not be reported as the true parent element. 隱含的集合 (例如， ，是在隱含的) 不會被視為是基於如何的父項目這[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]宣告樹狀目錄中偵測模式。Implicit collections (for example, the that is implicit in the of a ) are not considered to be parent elements for purposes of how this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] declares the tree detection mode. 這[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]只會套用在附加的屬性定義的 get 存取子。This [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] should only be applied on the get accessor of attached property definitions. 不適用這[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]set 存取子。Do not apply this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] to the set accessor. 雖然直覺的方式是設定作業是由可瀏覽[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]子項目，它是目前狀態和 get 存取子的父項目的控制，則為 true 的行為特性。Although intuitively it is the set operation that is being made browsable for [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] on child elements, it is the presence and characteristics of the get accessor on the parent element that controls the true behavior. 附加的屬性是否可瀏覽在子元素不是絕對保證以某種方式的父項目確實處理附加的屬性值。Whether an attached property is browsable on a child element is not an absolute guarantee that the attached property value is really processed by the parent element in some manner. 此外，值不是絕對保證不會處理範圍，或未超過直屬父項目。Also, the value is not an absolute guarantee that the processing scope does or does not extend beyond the immediate parent element. 這些全部是特定的實作。All this is implementation specific. 不過，這[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]報告可瀏覽狀態是最適合提供機制，以報告的使用量資訊與功能資訊附加屬性。However, this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] for reporting the browsable state is the best available mechanism for reporting the usage information and functional information for an attached property. 因此，您通常可以假設可瀏覽附加屬性的狀態是類似於如何處理或解譯由應用程式程式碼中相關的父項目子項目之附加的屬性值的行為。Therefore, you can generally assume that the browsable state of an attached property is analogous to the behavior of how an attached property value on a child element is processed or interpreted by the relevant parent element in your application code. 如需宣告的附加屬性的一般資訊，請參閱[附加屬性概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/attached-properties-overview.md)。For general information on declaring attached properties, see [Attached Properties Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/attached-properties-overview.md). ## XAML 文字用法XAML Text Usage 這個類型的成員不通常會以[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。Members of this type are not typically used in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的預設值為 `false`。The default for is `false`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance bool Equals(object obj) cil managed
Public Overrides Function Equals (obj As Object) As Boolean

span.span: The to compare to the current .

summary.span: 判斷目前的 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] 是否等於指定的物件。

span.span: Determines whether the current [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] is equal to a specified object.

returns.span: 如果指定的 和目前的 相等，則為 ；否則為 。

span.span: if the specified is equal to the current ; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此實作會支援這所公開的一個可能可設定值的值相等性[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]， 。This implementation supports value equality of the one possible settable value exposed by this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)], .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance int32 GetHashCode() cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetHashCode () As Integer

summary.span: 傳回這個 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] 的雜湊碼。

span.span: Returns the hash code for this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)].

returns.span: 32 位元不帶正負號的整數值。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此實作支援根據一個可能的可設定值由這兩個雜湊值[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]， 。This implementation supports two possible hash values based on the one possible settable value exposed by this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)], .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IncludeDescendants { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值會宣告是否在已套用這個 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] 的附加屬性上使用深層模式來偵測父項目。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that declares whether to use the deep mode for detection of parent elements on the attached property where this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] is applied.

value.span: 如果在附加屬性所屬父項目的邏輯樹狀結構中，可以瀏覽所有子項目的附加屬性，則為 。

span.span: if the attached property is browsable for all child elements in the logical tree of the parent element that owns the attached property.

value.span: 如果在附加屬性所屬父項目的邏輯樹狀結構中，只可以瀏覽下層子項目的附加屬性，則為 。

span.span: if the attached property is only browsable for immediate child elements of a parent element that owns the attached property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 附加的屬性所定義的大多數[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]套用這樣搭配使用預設值是為`false`。Most of the attached properties defined by [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] that apply do so with the default of as `false`. ## XAML 文字用法XAML Text Usage 這個類型的成員不通常會以[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。Members of this type are not typically used in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].
